name: The muse (Xavier Carrascosa)
description:
The Muse Inspiration, sin and romanticism

Experimental interactive fiction.

Ignore my confused quill,
only you are my muse.


The Muse

Written by Xavier Carrascosa in 2022 (translation of the original in Spanish, to be presented at the ParserComp). - https://twitter.com/XCarrascosa | https://xaviercarrascosa.com/

Programmed with Inform 7 by Graham Nelson, version 7.9.3 (build 6M62) - http://inform7.com/downloads/

Art
